headline: At a Festive Drive-In, Biden Makes Pledge to Govern for All Americans
text: WILMINGTON, Del. — Joseph R. Biden Jr. addressed the nation for the first time as president-elect on Saturday night, delivering a message of unity and trying to soothe the extraordinary divisions that defined the last four years in American politics.
snippet: Joe Biden, in his first post-victory speech, joined his running mate, Senator Kamala Harris, in addressing the country and reached out to President Trump’s supporters. “Let’s give each other a chance,” he said.
